TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A substance that is being studied for its ability to make cancer cells respond better to chemotherapy drugs to which they have become resistant. It is a type of quinolone antibiotic.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Sustancia en estudio por su capacidad para hacer que las células cancerosas respondan mejor a los medicamentos quimioterapéuticos a los que se volvieron resistentes. Es un tipo de antibiótico de quinolona.
